Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Theodore:

Text.Language: <ere nak w~ pimarturoc: ,ere piswij n~genneoc: ,ere piaylovoroc: Yeo~dwroc pictratilat/c.
Hail to you O martyr: Hail to the courageous hero: Hail to the struggle-mantled: Theodore the general.
